fixes.name: Col DV01 T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Col DV01],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = EndDateParam,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Col DV01],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated nested IF logic from Tableau to DAX. Replaced parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]) and SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As]). All column references were converted to the table-qualified form 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName]. Implemented VARs for parameter values for clarity.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
